channel.title: Bullied bus monitor
channel.description:
I was debating on whether or not to put this under Intellectual Debates or General Discussion. I chose Intellectual Debates, obviously.
Anyways. On Thursday, during school I was watching Channel 1 and saw something about a bus monitor getting bullied, and I decided to look into it further. I went on YouTube and found this video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bJ9n8JQJy2c Please be aware, the kids do use vulgar language. If you can't stand to see the sight of bullying, please don't watch this video. As it makes some people cry.
Moving on. As I kept researching the topic, I found more out. Someone on indiegogo decided to help out Karen H. Klein. He raised over 500,000$+ to help her retire and go on a dream vacation.
Anyways, I want all of your opinions on this. Discuss.

item.title: Bullied bus monitor
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Tutorial:

I hope charges are pressed against these kids. There is a difference between committing a crime once and repeatedly doing it.

read the thread. there will be no charges pressed.

Showing kindness in certain situations can make people change for the better. Showing hate all the time can only make people worse.

item.title: Bullied bus monitor
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

JavaTC:

I do feel sorry for the kids though, a large portion of the public wanting you dead/wanting to harm you can’t be fun.

They should have thought about that before they started disrespecting an old lady and recording it, not to mention putting it up on the internet. They obviously wanted some kind of attention, this just might not be what they wanted.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullied bus monitor
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

“I’m going to bring my knife you and cut you”

and other death threats

hoooly crap. i didn’t watch it completely, but ooh… I wouldn’t hit them if I ever saw some kids bullying somebody else, I would get in their face, lift their asses up, pin them against the wall and start talking some shit about how does it feel. I wouldn’t risk going to jail just because some kids have nothing else to do. I would rather do that to other kids or at least scar them for life in a non-violent way, rather than wasting my life on one group of kids.

If somebody did that to my mom or grandma or any of my relatives or even friends, I would beat the shit out of them regardless of what I said above.

Read full topic

That’s fucking awful…

item.title: Bullied bus monitor
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:40, topic:459939”]Highschool wasnt the problem though, my alopecia stopped in highschool. It was elementary school (kinder + 1-8) that it was bad. Even then, I didnt care for my classmates I had other friends, I wasnt lacking anything.

fighting back was the response they were looking for at the time anyways, and it wasn’t hard for 6-7 of the boys to get me to the ground and start kicking and stomping lol. But I agree, I should have properly injured one of them. When I brought the issue up to the school, they made everyone write one good thing about everyone and share their list. Lmao it got so much more violent from there on.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

jme, I have a friend who has alopecia and we’re always in the pub(bar) together. He’s like 25 now and he was never bullied because his first day of highschool, some guy tried to bully him and he just punched him there and then; after that no-one bothered him.

CANADIA^^

item.title: Bullied bus monitor
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:28, topic:459939”][quote author=jme link=topic=562846.msg4105331#msg4105331 date=1347915200]
I got bullied and my ass kicked every single day at school. The schools failed to protect me. I never got any pity or money lol.
[/quote]

Did you ever think of standing up to them/fighting back?[/quote]

Sure did, only in my case it was me vs. the entire school, not just a couple of bullys. Thats why I was black and blue every day coming home and a few times even knocked unconcious lol… Usually it took the whole summer for my bruises to heal, only for them to come back the first day of school I think a lot of people would have cracked if they had to endure what I did, but I was optimistic always and never let it get me down. I had friends from other schools who didn’t look down on my condition. Looking back, we were stupid kids that knew nothing. By grade 9 is when I started to properly fight back and I broke a few people’s noses and they never fucked with me again. By the end of highschool people had matured and I was just like everyone else, went partying and had friends. I also don’t have alopecia anymore. I’ve been done school for 5 years and i’ve only been shown respect. My optimism paid off.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullied bus monitor
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

not everyones on a scot;).

Lol’d.

In Scotland bullying isn’t all that common if I’m honest, or at least it wasn’t at my School. Kidpaparoach may tell me otherwise. If two people have some form of issue or a group of people and one guy have an issue they just take the leader outside, give him a square go, winner wins and loser loses.

Moral of the story; if you’re ever in Scotland and you don’t back up your point then someone asks if you want to go outside, unless you’re certain you can deplete his pride don’t do it.

Read full topic

I got bullied and my ass kicked every single day at school. The schools failed to protect me. I never got any pity or money lol.

item.title: Bullied bus monitor
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:30, topic:459939”]I’ve been bullied by a gang member before. That shit sucks.

  1. If you fight and win, he gets his boys to mess you up or he’ll jump you
  2. If you fight and lose, you become a “beat in” target for new members. (Happened to my Dad when he was a kid)
  3. If you ignore it, they won’t stop because if 3 people find something funny, it won’t get old.

Hated middle school.[/quote]
summed it up perfectly^

Read full topic

  2. If you fight and lose, you become a “beat in” target for new members. (Happened to my Dad when he was a kid)
  3. If you ignore it, they won’t stop because if 3 people find something funny, it won’t get old.

Hated middle school.
